name: Bond: Wish of the Forest
storyline: Work together to rid the forest of evil spirits and save your home. Explore procedurally generated levels, find powerful upgrades, strengthen your bond with creatures, and uncover the destructive spirit's true intentions.
summary: Bond: Wish of the Forest is an action packed roguelite creature collector about making friends and fighting alongside them.
